TABLE.NAME: message_popup
TABLE.COMMENT: Keep state of notifications for the popup message processor

TABLE.NAME: message_popup_notifications
TABLE.COMMENT: List of notifications to display in the message output popup

TABLE.NAME: message_popup_subscriptions
TABLE.COMMENT: Store the push notification subscription information.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user ID the subscription relates to

FIELD.NAME: endpoint
FIELD.COMMENT: A URL provided by the push service to which the server sends a POST request to trigger a push message.

FIELD.NAME: p256dh
FIELD.COMMENT: A base64-encoded string representing the client's public key; used to encrypt the push message data.

FIELD.NAME: auth
FIELD.COMMENT: A base64-encoded authentication secret for the subscription, also used in encrypting the message data.

FIELD.NAME: expiration
FIELD.COMMENT: The time at which the subscription expires.
